thread.title: Smith Douglas Homes Presents the Commitment to Knowledge Event at Cassville Commons
thread.title_full: Smith Douglas Homes Presents the Commitment to Knowledge Event at Cassville Commons

title: Smith Douglas Homes Presents the Commitment to Knowledge Event at Cassville Commons
text: Email This Story Printer Friendly PDF Version RSS Feed Smith Douglas Homes Presents the Commitment to Knowledge Event at Cassville Commons Smith Douglas Homes believes that educated home buyers are the best home buyers, which is why we offer educational seminars for the potential home buyers in the community. Join us for our Commitment to Knowledge Seminar on Sept. 12th in Cartersville. ATLANTA, GA, August 28,   Smith Douglas Homes is hosting a Commitment to Knowledge event on Saturday, September 12th from 11 am - 2 pm. This event is an educational seminar for home buyers or other individuals interested in learning about the home buying process. The event takes place at the Cassville Commons community, located at 13 Thomas Court, Cartersville, GA 30121. The seminar itself is expected to last from 11:00-12:30 and will cover the following: - Financing - Why Buy New? Working With a New Home Specialist - Working With Your Builder - Q&A With a Panel of Experts After the seminar, attendees are encouraged to enjoy a catered lunch from 12:30-2:00. All attendees will receive a special incentive**. If you are interested in attending, RSVP by emailing CassvilleCommons@SmithDouglas.com or by calling us at 770-334-2220. Can't make it to the event? You can follow the conversation on twitter by using the hashtag #SDHCTK. Smith Douglas Homes is committed to providing the best value homes in the business. With over 40 years of experience, our team believes in standing firmly by our word with honesty and reliability. Our commitment to excellence covers every aspect of the home buying process. From the quality of the home you choose to the interactions you will have with your personal New Home Specialist, we strive to provide an exceptional experience for our home buyers. For more information about the well-crafted new homes and variety of floorplans available in Smith Douglas' new home communities throughout Bartow, Cherokee, Forsyth, Fulton, Gwinnett, Hall, and Paulding counties, please check out our beautiful models in person, or visit www.SmithDouglas.com . **See flyer for incentive details.Established in 2008, with over 40 years of previous experience in the home building industry, Smith Douglas Homes is an award-winning home builder known for constructing quality homes at affordable prices in sought-after metro Atlanta locations. For more information on new homes from Smith Douglas, visit www.SmithDouglas.com . # # #
